scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate dev
scripts.docker:up: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.docker:logs: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f
